testsuite.name: Product purchase flow test

testcase.name: Buying products that are in the shopping cart

testsuite.system-out: ?[92m|-- Given the 'user' is located on the opencart website?[0m ?[92m|---- user opens the http://opencart.abstracta.us/index.php?route=common/home?[0m ?[92m|-- When the user adds products to the cart?[0m ?[92m|---- User add products?[0m ?[92m|------ user enters '1' into Quantity?[0m ?[92m|-- Then the user can view 2 products in the cart?[0m ?[92m|---- Then products are?[0m ?[92m|-- When you checkout as a guest?[0m ?[92m|---- User complete the checkout?[0m ?[92m|------ User fill out form?[0m ?[92m|-------- user enters 'Prueba' into Name?[0m ?[92m|-------- user enters 'Apellido' into Last Name?[0m ?[92m|-------- user enters 'pruebacheckout1@yopmail.com' into Email?[0m ?[92m|-------- user enters '301001111' into Phone?[0m ?[92m|-------- user enters 'calle 45' into Address 1?[0m ?[92m|-------- user enters 'Medellin' into City?[0m ?[92m|-------- user enters '050029' into Post Code?[0m ?[92m|-------- user selects 47 in Country?[0m ?[92m|-------- user selects 721 in State?[0m ?[92m|-------- user clicks on Button continue?[0m ?[92m|-------- user enters 'Prueba' into comment?[0m ?[92m|-------- user clicks on Button shipping?[0m ?[92m|-------- user clicks on agree?[0m ?[92m|-------- user clicks on Button payment?[0m ?[92m|-------- user clicks on Button confirm order?[0m ?[92m|-- Then the user must be able to view the purchase confirmation.?[0m ?[92m|---- Then the order confirmation message?[0m
